articles.title: Eurozone Entered Into Technical Recession At Start Of 2023: Report - NDTV
articles.description: The eurozone entered into a technical recession at the start of the year, shrinking by 0.1 percent for a second consecutive quarter, figures from the EU's statistic agency showed Thursday.
articles.content:
The latest figures cast doubt over more optimistic predictions for the whole 2023. (Representational)
